text: Harlequin with a Guitar is an early 20th century painting by Spanish cubist Juan Gris. Done in oil on panel, the work is in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art. The Harlequin with his checkered costume was a favorite theme of cubists and Gris himself portrayed him in approximately forty works between 1917 and 1925. == References == Category:Paintings of the Metropolitan Museum of Art Category:1917 paintings Category:Paintings by Juan Gris Category:Musical instruments in art
